attributes.action: Urge RSPCA field officers to be given specific training in Equine health and care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A number of issues have been brought to the public gaze recently with regard to the RSPCA no responding to Equine suffering.  The most recent is the 'Spindles Farm' incident in Amersham Bucks.  Where officers had been visiting over the past number of years with no apparent action.
